name: Disconnection Request Details
query:
SELECT
    dr.name AS "Disconnection Request ID:Link/Disconnection Request:150",
    dr.status AS "DR Status:Data:120",
    dr.customer_name_2 AS "Customer Name:Data:200",
    dr.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:120",
    dr.reason_for_disconnection AS "Reason for Disconnection:Data:200",
    dr.notice_period_start_date AS "Notice Period Start Date:Date:150",
    dr.notice_period AS "Notice Period:Int:120",
    dr.disconnection_notice_date AS "Disconnection Notice End Date:Date:150",

    drm.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Link/Site:150",
    drm.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    drm.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:200",
    drm.serial_no_sim_no AS "Serial No/SIM No:Data:200",

    site.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:200",
    site.date AS "Circuit Delivery Date:Date:150",
    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",
    site.sales_order AS "Sales Order No:Link/Sales Order:150",
    site.zoho_sales_order_no AS "Zoho Sales Order No:Data:150",
    site.customer_po_no AS "Customer PO No:Data:150",
    site.customer_po_date AS "Customer PO Date:Date:150",

    so.custom_po_end_date AS "PO End Date:Date:150",
    so.custom_customer_purchase_amount AS "PO Amount:Currency:150"

FROM
    `tabDisconnection Request` dr
JOIN
    `tabDisconnection Multiple` drm ON drm.parent = dr.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` site ON site.name = drm.circuit_id
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order` so ON so.name = site.sales_order
ORDER BY
    dr.name DESC
